author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Safeguard Scientifics Issues Statement
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Safeguard Scientifics Inc:
* SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS ISSUES STATEMENT * SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS RESPONDS TO STATEMENTS FROM SIERRA CAPITAL INVESTMENTS L.P. AND YAKIRA CAPITAL MANAGEMENT
* SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS-‍NEITHER SIERRA NOR YAKIRA PROVIDED ANY “NEW, CREDIBLE AND ACTIONABLE IDEAS FOR ENHANCING VALUE FOR ALL SAFEGUARD SHAREHOLDERS”​
* SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS - IS REVIEWING A NUMBER OF POTENTIAL CANDIDATES FOR BOARD, INCLUDING THOSE CANDIDATES SUGGESTED BY SIERRA AND YAKIRA​
* SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFICS - AS PART OF PLAN TO STREAMLINE ORGANIZATIONAL STRUCTURE,CO CEASED DEPLOYMENT OF CAPITAL INTO NEW PARTNER COMPANY OPPORTUNITIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
